Sales Representative Job at Master–sam Techcons Limited




        
    

        
        Master–sam Techcons limited has been established as a manufacturing, installation, maintenance and repair, sales and training company. It carries out business activity in electrical/electronics repair, installation, supply and sales electrical and electronics devices, construction/building of circuits, domestic and industrial wiring services. It does solar and inverter installations, mobile phone repair, hardware and software maintenance and repair of PCs.

In educational sector, it carries out training programs and courses to groom individuals on electrical/electronics installation and repair such that after training, the individual can stand and start up a business on.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative
Job Location: Asaba, Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We seek a driven Sales Representative! You'll drive sales growth and customer relationships.


Responsibilities


	Identify leads and pitch products to potential clients
	Close deals and meet sales targets
	Provide customer support and after-sales service
	Collaborate with marketing team to develop sales strategies
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitor activity.


Qualifications


	B.Sc in Business Administration or related field
	2+ years of sales experience
	Strong communication and negotiation skills
	Proven track record of sales success.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary (N80,000 - N150,000 / month) and commission structure
	Opportunities for growth and development
	Dynamic work environment in a growing solar company.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: mastersamtechnology@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Moderator",
  "description": "Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment &amp; Selection, Performance management, Training &amp; Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Moderator

Job Location:&nbsp;Remote

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly detailed-oriented and responsible Content Moderator to support the safety, quality, and integrity of digital platforms.
	In this role, you will review, evaluate, and moderate user-generated content to ensure it complies with company guidelines, community standards, and applicable regulations.


Responsibilities


	Review and moderate user-generated contents such as; Texts, images, videos, and comments across digital platforms.
	Enforce community guidelines and content policies consistently and fairly.
	Identify, flag, and escalate inappropriate, harmful, or policy-violating content.
	Make accurate moderation decision within defined turnaround times.
	Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive contents with professionalism.
	Document moderate actions, and provide feedback to improve moderation processes.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure platform safety, and quality standard are met.
	Stay updated on policy changes and emerging online content trends.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Communications, Marketing, Business Administration or a relating field.
	3 years of proven experience in content moderation, community management, or a similar role.
	Strong written communication skills with excellent grammar and clarity.
	Ability to remain objective, calm, and fair in high-pressure situations.
	Basic computer skills and confidence using multiple platforms at once.
	Experience moderating high-traffic or live chat environments.

Content Moderator Job at Odixcity Consulting




        
    

        
        Odixcity Consulting is an International Hr consulting and procurement firm. With expertise in Recruitment & Selection, Performance management, Training & Development, Compensation and benefits as well as Outsourcing of goods and services for organizations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Moderator

Job Location: Remote

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly detailed-oriented and responsible Content Moderator to support the safety, quality, and integrity of digital platforms.
	In this role, you will review, evaluate, and moderate user-generated content to ensure it complies with company guidelines, community standards, and applicable regulations.


Responsibilities


	Review and moderate user-generated contents such as; Texts, images, videos, and comments across digital platforms.
	Enforce community guidelines and content policies consistently and fairly.
	Identify, flag, and escalate inappropriate, harmful, or policy-violating content.
	Make accurate moderation decision within defined turnaround times.
	Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive contents with professionalism.
	Document moderate actions, and provide feedback to improve moderation processes.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure platform safety, and quality standard are met.
	Stay updated on policy changes and emerging online content trends.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Communications, Marketing, Business Administration or a relating field.
	3 years of proven experience in content moderation, community management, or a similar role.
	Strong written communication skills with excellent grammar and clarity.
	Ability to remain objective, calm, and fair in high-pressure situations.
	Basic computer skills and confidence using multiple platforms at once.
	Experience moderating high-traffic or live chat environments.
	Knowledge of social media platforms, forums, or online communities.
	Understanding of online safety, harassment prevention, and digital etiquette.
	Ability to work flexible shifts, including evenings or weekends if required.
	Attention to detail.


Salary
N500,000 / month (Non-negotiable).

Method of Application
